ingredients.item: 350g tub essential Tomato & Basil Pasta Sauce
400g can essential Red Kidney Beans In Chilli Sauce
1 tsp Santa Maria Original Fajita Medium Seasoning

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large saucepan and gently fry the onion and celery for 3 minutes to soften. Stir in the tomato and basil sauce, red kidney beans with their sauce, fajita seasoning and 400ml water.
Bring gently to a simmer, cover and cook for 15 minutes. Stir in the tomatoes and cook for a further 5 minutes.
Ladle the soup into warm bowls and scatter with vegan block to serve. Try adding warm tortillas on the side for something more substantial.
